PerspectiveCamera Class

Defined in: src/davinci-eight/scene/PerspectiveCamera.ts:34

Constructor

PerspectiveCamera

(
  • [fov = 75 * Math.PI / 180]
  • [aspect=1]
  • [near=0.1]
  • [far=2000]
)

Defined in src/davinci-eight/scene/PerspectiveCamera.ts:34

Parameters:

  • [fov = 75 * Math.PI / 180] Number optional
  • [aspect=1] Number optional
  • [near=0.1] Number optional
  • [far=2000] Number optional

Example:

  var camera = new EIGHT.PerspectiveCamera()
  camera.setAspect(canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight)
  camera.setFov(3.0 * e3)

Properties

aspect

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/scene/PerspectiveCamera.ts:77

The aspect ratio (width / height) of the camera viewport.

eye

Vector3

Defined in src/davinci-eight/scene/PerspectiveCamera.ts:96

The position of the camera.

fov

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/scene/PerspectiveCamera.ts:115

The field of view is the (planar) angle (magnitude) in the camera horizontal plane that encloses object that can be seen. Measured in radians.

near

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/scene/PerspectiveCamera.ts:148

The distance to the near plane.
